<topcClas>Religion and values - Society and culture</topcClas>         <topcClas>Social attitudes and behaviour - Society and culture</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>The <i>Northern Ireland Social Attitudes and Life and Times Combined Dataset, 1989-2004</i> is a derived dataset providing information on social attitudes in Northern Ireland, focusing mainly on community relations and political issues, and allowing analysis across time. It pools data from the following four sources: <ul><li><a href="http://www.data-archive.ac.uk/findingData/nisasTitles.asp" title="Northern Ireland Social Attitudes Surveys"><i>Northern Ireland Social Attitudes Surveys, 1989-1996</i></a> (NISA) (held at the UK Data Archive under GN 33235. This series finished in 1996.)</li><li><a href="http://www.data-archive.ac.uk/findingData/niltTitles.asp" title="Northern Ireland Life and Times Surveys"><i>Northern Ireland Life and Times Survey</i></a> (NILT) (held at the Archive under GN 33312. This dataset uses data from the 1998-2009 surveys, but the NILT series is still ongoing.)</li><li><i>Northern Ireland Referendum and Election Study, 1998</i> (held under SN 5442)</li><li><i>Northern Ireland Assembly Election Study, 2003</i> (held under SN 5394)</li></ul>Further information about the combined dataset, including some tables of results and links to other surveys not held at the Archive are available on the ARK <a href="http://www.ark.ac.uk/sol/surveys/community_relations/time_series/" title="Surveys Online (SOL) Community Relations and Political Attitudes, 1989-2009">Surveys Online (SOL) Community Relations and Political Attitudes, 1989-2009</a> web pages. <br> <br> No specific documentation exists for this dataset. Users are advised to consult the original documentation for the NISA and NILT series, and to check the ARK web pages linked above.<br> <br> The first edition of this study contained data from 1989-2004. For the second edition (August 2010), data from 2005-2009 have been added.<br> </abstract>       <abstract><B>Main Topics</B>:<br>Topics covered include social, political and religious issues and attitudes, associated discrimination and inequality, community relations, and demographic details.</abstract>       <sumDscr>         <collDate event="start" date="1989-01-01T00:00:00Z">January 1989</collDate>         <collDate event="end" date="2009-12-01T00:00:00Z">December 2009</collDate>         <nation>Northern Ireland</nation>         <geogUnit>No spatial unit</geogUnit>         <anlyUnit>Individuals</anlyUnit>         <universe>National</universe>         <universe>Electors and residents of Northern Ireland aged 18 years and over, surveyed during 1989-2009</universe>         <dataKind>Numeric data</dataKind>         <dataKind> Individual (micro) level</dataKind>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Cross-sectional (one-time) study</timeMeth>         <timeMeth>Dataset is derived from repeated cross-sectional series. See 'Abstract' section above for details</timeMeth>         <sampProc>Multi-stage stratified random sample</sampProc>         <deviat>24,160 cases</deviat>         <collMode>Compilation or synthesis of existing material</collMode>         <collMode>Original surveys used face-to-face interviews and self-completion questionnaires</collMode>         <sources>           <dataSrc>See 'Abstract' section above for details of and links to original sources.</dataSrc>         </sources>         <weight>Weighting used. Weighting variable is WTFACTOR</weight>         <cleanOps>A</cleanOps>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac>UK Data Service</accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Available to all registered users for any use</specPerm>         <restrctn>The depositor has specified that registration is required. Available to all registered users. The depositor may be informed about usage.</restrctn>         <contact><a href=http://www.ukdataservice.ac.uk/help/get-in-touch.aspx>Get in touch</a></contact>         <disclaimer>No specific documentation exists for this dataset. Users are advised to consult the original documentation for the NISA and NILT series, and to check the ARK <a href="http://www.ark.ac.uk/sol/surveys/community_relations/time_series/" title="Surveys Online (SOL) Community Relations and Political Attitudes, 1989-2003">Surveys Online (SOL) Community Relations and Political Attitudes, 1989-2003</a> web pages. </disclaimer>       </useStmt>     </dataAccs>     <othrStdyMat>       <relStdy>5394 Northern Ireland Assembly Election Survey, 2003 </relStdy>       <relStdy>5442 Northern Ireland Referendum and Election Survey, 1998 </relStdy>       <relPubl>McAllister, I.
